title: For Athletic Bruises: New Double Dose Vitamin K Cream Helps Clear Skin Discoloration Suffered from Sports
text:
To help fade and clear skin bruises a stronger, quicker solution is now available via a new double dose formula within Vitamin K Cream.
The enhanced Vitamin K Cream can help diminish, fade and clear bruises, black & blue sports marks, and other unsightly marks on facial areas, and under-eye.
It is also helpful before and after surgery re: surgical bruising.
Research by the Dermatology Center, Nashville, showed that just 1% Vitamin K applied twice daily (AM and PM) showed positive results. But a new formula from Reviva Labs, Haddonfield, N.J., now offers 2% Vitamin K.
The new, stronger strength Vitamin K Cream is for all skin types.
It is suitable for day or night application.
Reviva Labs, now in its 40th year of producing a full line of skin care products is noted as an innovator and skin care industry leader.
For more information contact Reviva Labs, 705 Hopkins Rd., Haddonfield, N.J. 08033; Tel.: 800- 257-7774; Fax: 856-429-0767; www.RevivaLabs.com.
